answers.author: Mark Abeles-Allison
answers.text:
We use VantageFlex.  My contact is greg@vantageflex.com.  Strong knowledge base, very helpful and proficient in plan creation, very competative pricing.

author: James May
text:
My organization is considering several proposals from TPAs to administer multiple employee benefit programs and implement a flexible spending account program.  Has anyone worked with P&A Administrative Services, Chard Snyder, or Flexible Benefits Administrators, and would be willing to share their experience in this forum?
Thanks!
title: Flexible Spending
